Twilight_Grasp.help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
Twilight_Grasp.targetHelp: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your Accuracy and Damage potential.

Darkest_Night.help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and Accuracy of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Slow
Darkest_Night.targetHelp: Your Accuracy and Damage potential are reduced by the darkness.

Shadow_Fall.help: Envelops you and your nearby teammates in a shroud of darkness. Shadow Fall does not grant Invisibility, but it does make you harder to detect. Even if you are discovered, Shadow Fall grants a bonus to Defense and Resistance to Fear, while reducing Energy, Negative Energy, and Psionic Damage. Shadow Fall reduces your movement speed, but not your allies'. Recharge: Slow
Shadow_Fall.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF, +Res(Energy, Negative, Psionics, Fear)
Shadow_Fall.targetHelp: Shadow Fall has made you difficult to detect, which increases your Defense. Shadowfall also partially absorbs and deflects Energy, Negative Energy and Psionic damage. You are also less fearful.
Shadow_Fall.victimHit: You are hidden within the Shadow Fall.

Fearsome_Stare.help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.targetHelp: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

Lift.help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Gravity_Distortion.help: Causes a single foe to be trapped in a misshapen gravity field, rendering him unable to take action. Gravity Distortion deals Smashing damage to the target. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gravity_Distortion.targetHelp: You have been caught in a Gravity Distortion. You cannot move and cannot fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

Propel.help: You can open a gravitational rift and retrieve a heavy object, then Propel it at your foes for Smashing Damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
